content.title: Chief Minister’s Startup/innovation Projects/new Industries
content.department: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
content.details: In order to turn the educated youth from job seekers to job creators and in order to give support to the ‘Startup’ and ‘innovative projects’ in the state and to provide skills to the youth and potential investors to develop entrepreneurship, the 'Chief Minister’s Startup/Innovation Projects/New Industries Scheme' has been formulated. The scheme envisages various incentives for startups to enable the entrepreneur’s success in their ventures. It also makes provision for the creation of incubation Centers in the host institutions in the State to build capacities, develop networking, establish the necessary infrastructure, and generate awareness.
benefits: Rs. 25,000/- per month will be provided to the innovation projects as sustenance allowance for one year whose project is recommended by the Host Institution and approved by the Empowered Committee.
The incubation center will provide support to the startups and innovation projects by providing mentoring services, and access to their labs, facilities, etc. on a free-of-cost (FOC) basis.
Marketing/commercialization assistance of a maximum of Rs. 10 lakhs will be provided to the innovation project to launch its products/services in the market.

Patent Filing Cost: The cost of filing and processing patent applications will be reimbursed to the incubated startup companies subject to a limit of Rs. 2 lakh (0.2 million) per Indian patent awarded or actual cost incurred, whichever is less.
eligibility: All Startups/New Industries/Innovation Projects as defined in the scheme would be eligible for availing applicable incentives.
The same incentives cannot be availed on the same component under State and Central Scheme.

faqs.question: Who are eligible to apply under this Scheme?
faqs.answer: All Start-Ups/New Industries/Innovation Projects would be eligible for availing applicable incentives.

faqs.question: What is the official website to apply online?
Any required document to submit?
faqs.answer: All the innovation enterprises would be required to submit only self-certified documents online or manually.
